question: Which of the following was the Peshwa under Shahji Bhonsle?
explanation: Shyampant Kulkarni Ranzekar was the second Peshwa of the Maratha Empire and ruled from 1652 CE to 1657 CE. He was the Peshwa under Shahji Bhonsle and he was probably removed from his post by Shivaji following some allegations of mismanagement.
